Class Dictionary

java.lang.Object
Dictionary
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<DictionaryItem>
public class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<DictionaryItem>
Class to represent a Dictionary in the Translator program
See Also:
Serialized Form

      pLanguageA - Name of the first language
      pLanguageB - Name of the second language

    • Dictionary

      public Dictionary​(java.io.File input, java.lang.String pName, java.lang.String pLanguageA, java.lang.String pLanguageB) throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Reads in adequately formatted .txt file and generates dictionary
      Parameters:
      input - the file to be read in
      pName - name of the dictionary
      pLanguageA - language input
      pLanguageB - language to be translated to
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - if file is not txt

  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add​(java.lang.String wordA, java.lang.String wordB)
      Adds a new entry into the dictionary by populating both directional trees
      Parameters:
      wordA - Word in language A
      wordB - Word in language B
      Returns:
      Whether it was successfully added to the dictionary

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(java.lang.String word)
      Removes a word from the dictionary
      Parameters:
      word - The word to remove
      Returns:
      Whether the word was successfully removed from the dictionary

    • find

      public java.lang.String find​(java.lang.String original, int dir) throws NoTranslationFoundException, InvalidTranslationDirectionException
      Finds the translation of a word in the specified translation direction
      Parameters:
      original - The word to translate
      dir - The direction to translate in (0 ==> A to B ; 1 ==> B to A)
      Returns:
      The translation of the word
      Throws:
      NoTranslationFoundException - When the translation could not be found
      InvalidTranslationDirectionException - When the translation direction is not 0 or 1
